examples.example: 鸵鸟虽然不会飞，但它在陆地上也能快乐地生活着。

translate.english: Although ostriches cannot fly, they can also live happily on the land.

examples.example: 小朋友们在动物园里看到鸵鸟时兴奋地欢呼起来。

translate.english: When the children saw ostriches in the zoo, they shouted excitedly.

examples.example: 可爱的鸵鸟迈着大步，在广阔的草原上自在地奔跑。

translate.english: The cute ostrich strides and runs freely on the vast grassland.
